name: Zap SRM Launcher
customPrimary: Each missile fires an electric arc at up to %s range when a target passes in front of it. Fighters take an extra %s EMP damage.

name: Rotary Hammer Launcher
customPrimary: The drum can hold %s torpedoes and is reloaded %s torpedoes at a time from the internal magazine. Rotation of the drum resets the reload.

name: Spike Driver
customPrimary: Rate of fire starts at %s and increases as accuracy degrades.
